name: Loading Incomplete
description:
When the progress bar can't pass 99%, you need to play an 'endless' runner to complete loading.

The only way to get the loading bar to 100% is to - you guessed it - speed up time!
What? Oh, you didn't guess that? Well - it is! See if you can finish the loading process by completing a seemingly endless runner, without reverting your progress (by 0.05%) by hitting reverse loading symbols.

Colour Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/twilight-5

CONTROLS

  • W+S / Up+Down Arrow Keys - Move Player

Loading Incomplete was made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #99.
Theme: "99%".
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
